title: Hooray, 40000!
content:
Congratulations, Typophile!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/40000_4230.png)

 [‹ Ignorance is bliss?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40079 "Go to previous forum topic") [Tell me more about Parachute fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39777 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Florian Hardwig

comments.content:
Miaow! Strike Up the Ampersand.

Kerns of Endearment to punchcut and the mods.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/miaow_6100.gif)

j i m m y   c a t
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cat-saying-hooray_4820.jpg)
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/wowee_4517.jpg)

Someone -please “Splen it to me Lucy” as in 40,000 what?

ChrisL
The post number, silly!

Where does that number show up?

(And by the way, great feline pics, all!)

I can’t see the post number either but I readily admit to being silly :-)

ChrisL

LOL ROFL!!

Meow-meow!

ROFL!

You guys are great.

j a m e s

Look in the url window on your browser. I noticed late last night (the Barbara Kruger thread) that we were getting close but the Europeans got a jump on it. I remember driving around with my mom one day, as a kid, waiting for the car odometer to turn to 100000.

That picture I posted is 20 pounds of cat.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hog_6268.jpg)
  
Chris, it’s in the URL!  
;°)

[edit]  
Patty, you beat me concerning the URL, but not to the <cite>20 pounds</cite>!

Hoy vey! the URL! Thanks Patty and Florian!

ChrisL

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/odometer_4387.gif)

:-)
Chris, you avatar is [dripping](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402/http:/typophile.com/node/39992)! ;-)

Yes, Ricardo! Check out this thread from Joe Pemberton:

[http://typophile.com/node/39993](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402/http:/typophile.com/node/39993 "http://typophile.com/node/39993")

ChrisL

Ricardo,  
You better fill your gas tank soon! :-)

ChrisL

Patty,  
You have a 20 pond cat!? Yikes, that is a big one!

ChrisL
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Wabbit_4686.jpg)

<cite>You have a 20 pond cat!? Yikes, that is a big one!</cite>

20 pounds of love. He is huge and he snores. Purrs like a freight train. Sweetest thing ever.

Sorry about the 20 “pond” thing, I was all wet with that spelling, I meant to say 20 pound :-/

ChrisL

Chris, don’t worry, I saw the earlier post (39993). :-)  
I’ll be filling my tank soon!

It takes 40,000 licks it takes to get to the center!?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ipop_yoffy_mr_owl_5715.jpg)

Owl bet you are right, Joe :-)

ChrisL

Great kitty pics, James.

Congrats to Typophile!
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/IMG_1486_6453.jpg)

Not even half a million... why all the excitement?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture%20013_5476.jpg)

-=®=-

It’s a nice round number.  
Somebody work out how long  
it will take to get the next  
100,000 posts.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515210402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/chibidog_6604.jpg)
